trait.name: Death Throes (Demon Only)
entries: When the spirit drops to 0 Hit Points or the spell ends, the spirit explodes. {@actSave dex} DC equals your spell save DC, each creature in a 10-foot Emanation originating from the spirit. {@actSaveFail} {@damage 2d10} plus this spell's level Fire damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

trait.name: Devil's Sight (Devil Only)
entries: Magical Darkness doesn't impede the spirit's Darkvision.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The spirit has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The spirit makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (round down).

action.name: Bite (Demon Only)
entries: {@atkr m} {@hitYourSpellAttack Bonus equals your spell attack modifier}, reach 5 ft. {@h}{@damage 1d12 + 3 + summonSpellLevel} Necrotic damage.

action.name: Claws (Yugoloth Only)
entries: {@atkr m} {@hitYourSpellAttack Bonus equals your spell attack modifier}, reach 5 ft. {@h}{@damage 1d8 + 3 + summonSpellLevel} Slashing damage. Immediately after the attack hits or misses, the spirit can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

action.name: Fiery Strike (Devil Only)
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hitYourSpellAttack Bonus equals your spell attack modifier}, reach 5 ft. or range 150 ft. {@h}{@damage 2d6 + 3 + summonSpellLevel} Fire damage.
